LanguageData.Chicken.label: Chicken
LanguageData.Chicken.description: The most traditional farm bird, the chicken is raised for its eggs and meat.
LanguageData.Chicken_Meat.label: chicken meat
LanguageData.Chicken_Corpse.label: chicken corpse
LanguageData.Pig.label: Pig
LanguageData.Pig.description: The pig was one of the first animals domesticated by humans. It is commonly raised for meat and leather, and is easy to feed because of its omnivorous diet.
LanguageData.Pig_Leather.label: pig leather
LanguageData.Pig_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a pig.
LanguageData.Pig_Meat.label: pig meat
LanguageData.Pig_Corpse.label: pig corpse
LanguageData.Cow.label: Cow
LanguageData.Cow.description: A very common domestic animal. It can produce large amounts of milk, or be slaughtered for delicious food.
LanguageData.Cow_Leather.label: cow leather
LanguageData.Cow_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a cow.
LanguageData.Cow_Meat.label: cow meat
LanguageData.Cow_Corpse.label: cow corpse
LanguageData.Alpaca.label: Alpaca
LanguageData.Alpaca.description: A medium-sized ungulate closely related to the llama, the alpaca is often farmed for its remarkably soft wool.
LanguageData.Alpaca_Leather.label: alpaca leather
LanguageData.Alpaca_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a alpaca.
LanguageData.Alpaca_Meat.label: alpaca meat
LanguageData.Alpaca_Corpse.label: alpaca corpse
